name: Autodesk Architecture
category: Architectural designing solution for all business sizes
description:

name: ArCADia BIM 12
category: BIM design process platform for architects/contractors

name: ArCADia-ARCHITECTURE

name: SolidBuilder
category: Create designs, visualizations, and blueprints with ease
